程序包 representation

类 NodeDecorator

java.lang.Object
representation.Node
representation.NodeDecorator
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable, Event
直接已知子类:
ImageNode, SoundNode
public abstract class NodeDecorator extends Node implements Event
Represents a decorator for nodes in the game, providing additional functionality or information while maintaining the same interface as a standard node.
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • NodeDecorator

      public NodeDecorator(Node wrappedNode)
      Constructs a NodeDecorator wrapping around an existing node.
      参数:
      wrappedNode - The node to be wrapped by this decorator.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getWrappedNode

      public Node getWrappedNode()
      Returns the wrapped node.
      返回:
      The node that this decorator is enhancing or modifying.

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the description or content of the wrapped node.
      指定者:
      display 在接口中 Event
      指定者:
      display 在类中 Node

    • chooseNext

      public Node chooseNext()
      Delegates the choice of the next node to the wrapped node's logic.
      指定者:
      chooseNext 在接口中 Event
      指定者:
      chooseNext 在类中 Node
      返回:
      The next node as determined by the wrapped node.
